subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Amare Stoudemire had 28 points and 10 rebounds in 28 minutes, and the host Phoenix Suns set a franchise record with their 15th consecutive victory last night in a 115-98 victory against the Toronto Raptors.
snippet: Amare Stoudemire had 28 points and 10 rebounds in 28 minutes, and the host Phoenix Suns set a franchise record with their 15th consecutive victory last night in a 115-98 victory against the Toronto Raptors.
